# prepare(for:)

**Instance Method**

A method where you can prepare the metal device with initial setup work.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated mutating func prepare(for device: any MTLDevice)
```

## Discussion

When you set or update the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityViewRenderingEffects/customPostProcessing] property, RealityKit calls this method once, after it does its setup work, but before rendering the next frame.

Adding long-running tasks in this method may cause rendering hitches.
